name: Burn the Witch (itch)
description:
Brew potions so they won't burn you

You're a witch whose life was spare by the village only because you can help the villagers to get potions.

If you failed at giving them the potions they will burn you

How to play:

  • Move using the arrow keys
  • Cat will give you a letter from a villager
  • You need to brew that color potion before the time is over
  • Make sure the order of the ingredients is correct, if isn't, there will be no potion
  • Once you've done the potion, give it to Cat so it will deliver to the villager and you will be spare
You can download for free the source code(.p8) right HERE
